questions.question: Which historical battle site in the United States is recognized for the decisive 1863 confrontation during the Civil War, which turned the tide in favor of the Union forces?

questions.question: Which famous museum in France was originally a royal palace and now houses thousands of works, including the acclaimed painting 'Mona Lisa'?

questions.question: Which ancient ruin in Greece is a former religious center linked to athletic and religious festivals, and said to be the birthplace of the Olympic Games?
